skills.name: acrobatics
skills.description: Performing feats of gymnastics, extraordinary balance, and dance (and related performance arts), as well as breaking falls. useful for running obstacle courses or doing courtly promenade.

skills.name: fighting
skills.description: Competence in unarmed combat.

skills.name: climbing
skills.description: Scaling various surfaces.

skills.name: contortion
skills.description: Escaping from otherwise secure physical bonds by twisting, writhing, and contorting the body.

skills.name: dodge
skills.description: Slipping out of danger's way, whether avoiding an attack or a sprung booby trap.

skills.name: flying
skills.description: Maneuvering under one's own power (such as with wings).

skills.name: jumping
skills.description: Leaping over obstacles.

skills.name: melee combat
skills.description: Wielding hand-to-hand weapons.

skills.name: riding
skills.description: Controlling and riding domesticated mounts.

skills.name: stealth
skills.description: Moving silently and avoiding detection, whether through shadows or crowds.

skills.name: charioteering
skills.description: Accelerating, steering, and decelerating chariots (in particular) or any kind of cart-and-animal vehicle.

skills.name: lockpicking
skills.description: Opening a mechanical lock without possessing the key or combination.

skills.name: marksmanship
skills.description: Shooting any kind of mechanical device — such as a bow or sling — that projects missiles across a distance.

skills.name: pilotry
skills.description: Operating any water-faring vehicle, including steering, applying the oars, or managing the sails.

skills.name: sleight of hand
skills.description: Nimbleness with the fingers and misdirection, including picking pockets, palming items, and stage magic.

skills.name: throwing
skills.description: Hitting a target accurately with a thrown item, including stones, javelins, bottles, and knives. Also used for catching thrown items.

skills.name: lifting
skills.description: Moving or lifting heavy objects, as well as representing the ability to inflict additional damage with strength-powered weapons.

skills.name: running
skills.description: Moving quickly on the ground while avoiding obstacles and keeping from stumbling.

skills.name: stamina
skills.description: Physical endurance and resistance to pain, disease, and poison.

skills.name: swimming
skills.description: Moving and surviving in a liquid medium.

skills.name: cultures
skills.description: Comprehension of customs, traditions, art, history, politics, and views on outsiders of various regions or groups, as well as the ability to generalize about common cultural forms.

skills.name: devices
skills.description: Using and designing complex mechanical equipment. Actually building items requires crafting.

skills.name: healing
skills.description: Dressing wounds, applying splints, and disinfecting injuries, plus an understanding and application of medical procedures, such as diagnosing illnesses and performing surgery.

skills.name: navigation
skills.description: Determining the correct course using external reference points, such as stars, maps, or landmarks, as well as creating maps.

skills.name: reading/writing
skills.description: Familiarity with and ability to understand various forms of written communication, as well as the ability to create literary compositions, including forging papers and identifying such forgeries. Characters do not begin with the ability to read or write.

skills.name: scholar
skills.description: This skill represents knowledge and/or education in areas not covered under any other skill (such as alchemy, cooking, arcane lore, etc.). This may be restricted to a specific field (represented by specializations) or a general knowledge of a wide range of subjects. It is used to remember details, rumors, tales, legends, theories, important people, and the like, as appropriate for the subject in question. However, the broader the category, the fewer the details that can be recalled. It covers what the character himself can recall. Having another skill as a specialization of the scholar skill means that the character knows the theories and history behind the skill but can't actually use it. Scholar can be useful with investigation to narrow a search for information.

skills.name: speaking
skills.description: Familiarity with and ability to understand various forms of verbal communication. Characters know the Trade Speech (assuming the setting has one) and one 'native' language in which they have spoken fluency. Additional languages in which a character has proficiency can be represented by specializations of this skill.

skills.name: trading
skills.description: Knowledge of business practices, exchange rates, the monetary value of goods and opportunities, and other information regarding barter and sales, including the ability to determine how to make money with another skill the character has. Trading can complement bluff, charm, and persuasion when haggling over prices for goods and services being bought or sold.

skills.name: traps
skills.description: Installing, altering, and bypassing security devices, as well as identifying various kinds of traps (gas, pit, wire-triggered, etc.).

skills.name: artist
skills.description: Making works of art, like paintings, music compositions, and dance choreographies.

skills.name: crafting
skills.description: Creating, fixing, or modifying equipment, weapons, armor, and vehicles, as well as woodworking, metalworking, constructing buildings, and the like.

skills.name: disguise
skills.description: Altering features or clothing to be unrecognizable or to look like someone else. Also useful in acting performances.

skills.name: gambling
skills.description: Playing and cheating at games of strategy and luck.

skills.name: investigation
skills.description: Gathering information, researching topics, analyzing data, and piecing together clues.

skills.name: know-how
skills.description: Figuring out how to perform an action in which the character does not have experience, as well as a catch-all skill encompassing areas not covered by other skills (such as utilitarian sewing or cooking).

skills.name: search
skills.description: Spotting hidden objects or people, reconnoitering, lipreading, or eavesdropping on or watching another person.

skills.name: streetwise
skills.description: Finding information, goods, and contacts in an urban environment, particularly through thieves' guilds and similar criminal organizations, black markets, and other illicit operations. Also useful for determining possible motives and methods of criminals.

skills.name: survival
skills.description: Surviving in wilderness environments, including the ability to identify plants, animals, and their nutritional and medicinal uses.

skills.name: tracking
skills.description: Following the trail of another person, animal, or creature, or keeping after a moving target without being noticed.

skills.name: animal handling
skills.description: Controlling animals and making them perform tricks and follow commands.

skills.name: bluff
skills.description: Lying, tricking, or deceiving others, as well as verbal evasion, misdirection, and blustering. Disguise can complement uses of this skill. Also useful in putting on acting performances.

skills.name: charm
skills.description: Using friendliness, flattery, or seduction to influence someone else. Also useful in sales and bartering transactions, putting on performances (such as singing, acting, or storytelling), and situations involving etiquette.

skills.name: command
skills.description: Effectively ordering and coordinating others in team situations.

skills.name: intimidation
skills.description: Using physical presence, verbal threats, taunts, torture, or fear to influence others or get information out of them.

skills.name: mettle
skills.description: Ability to withstand stress, temptation, other people's interaction attempts, mental attacks, and pain. The gamemaster may allow a specialization in a specific faith tradition or belief system to enhance many, though not all, applications of mettle.

skills.name: persuasion
skills.description: Influencing others or getting information out of them through bribery, honest discussion, debate, diplomacy, or speeches. Also useful in negotiations, business transactions, storytelling, and oration.

skills.name: alteration - magic
skills.description: Casting spells involving change.

skills.name: apportation - magic
skills.description: Casting spells involving movement.

skills.name: divination - magic
skills.description: Casting spells involving knowledge.

skills.name: conjuration - magic
skills.description: Casting spells involving creation.

skills.name: divination - miracle
skills.description: Requesting divine aid to gain knowledge of the past, present, or future.

skills.name: favor - miracle
skills.description: Requesting divine aid to help, improve, heal, or benefit someone or something.

skills.name: strife - miracle
skills.description: Requesting divine aid to cause injury or destruction.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Tumbling, leaping gracefully, and other gymnastic skills

skills.name: Archaic Guns
skills.description: Using old-style black powder weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of gun: matchlock, musket, etc.

skills.name: Blaster
skills.description: Using character-scale energy weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of blaster: blaster pistol, BlasTech DL-44, etc.

skills.name: Blaster Artillery
skills.description: Using heavy mounted support weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of artillery: anti-infantry, surface-to-space, etc.

skills.name: Bowcaster
skills.description: Using the Wookiee bowcaster

skills.name: Bows
skills.description: Using bow-type weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of bow: long bow, crossbow, etc.

skills.name: Brawling Parry
skills.description: Defense against brawling or melee attacks
skills.specializations: Against specific type of brawling: boxing, martial arts, etc.

skills.name: Contortions
skills.description: The ability to escape from bonds or tightly enclosed places; similar to the Jedi power Contort/Escape

skills.name: Dancing
skills.description: Moving to a musical beat and looking good while doing it

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Defense against any attack, and getting out of the way
skills.specializations: Against specific type of attack: energy weapons, grenades, etc.

skills.name: Firearms
skills.description: Using non-archaic projectile weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: pistol, machine gun, etc.

skills.name: Grenade
skills.description: Throwing a portable explosive at a target area
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: thermal detonator, anti-vehicle grenade, etc.

skills.name: Lightsaber
skills.description: Using the ancient but powerful weapon of the Jedi Knights

skills.name: Melee Combat
skills.description: Using hand-to-hand weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: club, vibro-blade, etc.

skills.name: Melee Parry
skills.description: Using a melee weapon to defend against a melee combat attack
skills.specializations: Against specific type of weapon: lightsaber, club, etc.

skills.name: Missile Weapon
skills.description: Used to operate a missile and missile launchers
skills.specializations: Type of model or missile: concussion missile, grenade launcher, etc.

skills.name: Pick Pocket
skills.description: Picking pockets at sleight-of-hand tricks

skills.name: Running:
skills.description: Moving quickly
skills.specializations: Long distance, short sprint, etc.

skills.name: Shockball Fling
skills.description: Throwing a shockball at an opponent

skills.name: Shockball Scoop
skills.description: Catching or picking up a shockball

skills.name: Slingshot
skills.description: Using a slingshot; useful for slaying giants

skills.name: Thrown Weapons
skills.description: Using a non-projectile missile weapon, usually primitive or improvised
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: knife, javelin, etc.

skills.name: Vehicle Blasters
skills.description: Using vehicle-mounted energy weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of blaster: blaster cannon, laser cannon, etc.

skills.name: Wedsphere
skills.description: Playing the sport of wedsphere

skills.name: Airship Operation
skills.description: Piloting airship vehicles

skills.name: Aquatic Ship Operation
skills.description: Piloting navel surface vehicles

skills.name: Archaic Starship Piloting
skills.description: Piloting primitive or ancient starship design
skills.specializations: Type or class of ship: Celaya-class courier, Corillian solar sails, etc.

skills.name: Astrogation
skills.description: Calculating and making a jump into hyperspace
skills.specializations: Trade route: Kessel run, Tatooine to Coruscant, etc.

skills.name: Beast Handling
skills.description: The ability to keep an animal under control

skills.name: Beast Riding
skills.description: Riding an animal
skills.specializations: Type of animal: bantha, tauntaun, etc.

skills.name: Capital Ship Gunnery
skills.description: Firing capital starship-scale weaponry
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: concussion missiles, ion cannons, etc.

skills.name: Capital Ship Piloting
skills.description: Piloting capital starship-scale starships
skills.specializations: Type or class of ship: Imperial Star Destroyer, Corellian corvette, etc.

skills.name: Capital Ship Shields
skills.description: Operating capital starship-scale shields

skills.name: Ground Vehicle Operation
skills.description: Using a wheeled or tracked vehicle
skills.specializations: Type or model of vehicle: compact assault vehicle, Juggernaut, etc.

skills.name: Holorecorder Operation
skills.description: Using a ground effect vehicle

skills.name: Household Appliance Operation
skills.description: Operating blenders, vacuums, and other everyday appliances

skills.name: Hover Vehicle Operation
skills.description: Using a ground effect vehicle
skills.specializations: Type or model of vehicle: hoverscout, etc.

skills.name: Jet Pack Operation
skills.description: Using a jet pack

skills.name: Machinery Operation
skills.description: Using heavy industrial machines

skills.name: Musical Instrument Operation
skills.description: Using any musical instruments, except for one’s voice

skills.name: Powersuit Operation
skills.description: Using a powered space suit
skills.specializations: Type or model of suit: servo lifter, spacetrooper armor, etc.

skills.name: Repulsorlift Operation
skills.description: Using a repulsorlift vehicle
skills.specializations: Type or model of vehicle: XP-38 landspeeder, snowspeeder, etc.

skills.name: Sailed Nautical Vessel Operation
skills.description: Piloting sail-powered navel vessels

skills.name: Sensors
skills.description: Operation of scanner and sensor equipment
skills.specializations: Type or model of scanner: hand scanner, heat sensor, etc.

skills.name: Space Transports
skills.description: Piloting small freighters and light transports or shuttles
skills.specializations: Type or model of transport: YT-1300 transport, Gallofree medium transport

skills.name: Starfighter Piloting
skills.description: Piloting starfighters and snubfighters
skills.specializations: Type or model of starfighter: X-wing, TIE-fighter, etc.

skills.name: Starship Gunnery
skills.description: Firing space transports and starfighter weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: ion cannon, proton torpedoes

skills.name: Starship shields
skills.description: Operating starship-scale shields

skills.name: Swoop Operation
skills.description: Using a swoop, or scout or speeder bike

skills.name: Undersea Vehicle operation
skills.description: Using a navel submersible vehicle

skills.name: Walker Operation
skills.description: Using a mechanical walker
skills.specializations: Type or model of walker: AT-AT, AT-PT, etc.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.description: Number crunching

skills.name: Agriculture
skills.description: Knowledge of farms and farming techniques

skills.name: Alien Species
skills.description: Knowing facts and hearsay about other species
skills.specializations: Species: Wookiees, Mon Calamari, etc.

skills.name: Artist
skills.description: The ability to create aesthetically pleasing works of art (subjective, of course)
skills.specializations: Type of art or culture: painting, Twilek art, etc.

skills.name: Brainwashing
skills.description: Making a target completely obedient and subservient to either a specific cause or to the person doing the brainwashing

skills.name: Bureaucracy
skills.description: Familiarity with the whys and hows of government organizations
skills.specializations: Specific planet or administration: Tatooine, Bureau of Ships and Services, etc.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.description: The knowledge of how to run a business without bankrupting it

skills.name: Business
skills.description: Knowledge of industry and/or business
skills.specializations: Field or organization: starships, Stenar Fleet Systems, etc.

skills.name: Culinary Arts
skills.description: Knowing how to prepare a meal without poisoning anyone accidentally
skills.specializations: Type of dish or culture: pasta, Ewok cuisine, etc.

skills.name: Cultures
skills.description: Knowledge of another culture
skills.specializations: Planet or social group: Corellians, Alderaan royal family, etc.

skills.name: Drink Mixology
skills.description: Knowledge and ability to make exotic drinks

skills.name: Economics
skills.description: Management and production of material goods and services

skills.name: Home Economics
skills.description: Managing a household

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: The ability to threaten someone physically, verbally, or with body language
skills.specializations: Specific type of intimidation: interrogation, bullying, etc.

skills.name: Languages
skills.description: Comprehending and speaking alien or secret tongues
skills.specializations: Specific language: Wookiee, Bocce, etc.

skills.name: Law Enforcement
skills.description: Knowledge of law enforcement practices and procedures
skills.specializations: Specific planet or organization: Tatooine, the Rebel Alliance, etc.

skills.name: Military History
skills.description: Knowledge of military battles and tactics used in them

skills.name: Planetary Systems
skills.description: Spatial, navigational, and physical information about an area or system
skills.specializations: Specific system or planet: Hoth, Kessel, etc.

skills.name: Shockball
skills.description: Knowledge of maneuvers and tactics for the sport of shockball

skills.name: Streetwise
skills.description: How to make contact with informants or to conduct illegal activity. It also grants knowledge of crime bosses and gangs, and their activities
skills.specializations: Planet or criminal organization: Corellia, Black Sun, etc.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: How to locate food, water, and shelter in hostile climes or areas
skills.specializations: Type of environment: desert, poisonous atmosphere, etc.

skills.name: Tactics
skills.description: Knowledge of how to place troops and materials to attack the enemy
skills.specializations: Type of military unit: squads, fleets, etc.

skills.name: Traffic Control Procedures
skills.description: Knowing the standard practices for landing on a ship or starport

skills.name: Torture
skills.description: Causing a person physical harm in a controlled manner, usually to extract information or to exact a punishment

skills.name: Value
skills.description: Setting the cost or worth of a particular object or service
skills.specializations: Type of goods or planet’s markets: starships, Kessel, etc.

skills.name: Willpower
skills.description: Mental resistance to outside coercion
skills.specializations: Type of coercion to be resisted

skills.name: Brawling
skills.description: Attacking without a weapon
skills.specializations: Attack style: boxing, martial arts, etc.

skills.name: Cleaning
skills.description: The ability to clean stuff, like your room

skills.name: Climbing/Jumping
skills.description: Using physical prowess to climb or leap over obstacles
skills.specializations: Climbing, jumping

skills.name: Digging
skills.description: Using physical prowess to make a large hole in the ground

skills.name: Stamina
skills.description: The ability to resist exertion or attacks on a character’s Strength, or to resist the effects of alcohol

skills.name: Swimming
skills.description: The ability to swim over long distances, or using equipment to swim underwater

skills.name: Bargain
skills.description: The art of negotiating over goods and services
skills.specializations: Kind of merchandise: droids, spice, etc.

skills.name: Command
skills.description: Giving orders to those under your command
skills.specializations: Type of unit: Rogue Squadron, Imperial Stormtroopers, etc.

skills.name: Con
skills.description: Lying or giving misleading information
skills.specializations: Type of conning: fast-talk, disguise, etc.

skills.name: Forgery
skills.description: Forging a document or making a duplicate of a written or drawn item
skills.specializations: Type of document: starship permits, security codes

skills.name: Gambling
skills.description: Playing sabacc and other games of chance, and detecting cheaters
skills.specializations: Game of chance: sabacc, Trin sticks, etc.

skills.name: Cesa
skills.description: The ability to play the strategy game Cesa

skills.name: Hide
skills.description: Hiding and object, including oneself, so it cannot be found
skills.specializations: Camouflage

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: The ability to gather and make use of information regarding a person or organization’s activities
skills.specializations: Local or field of investigation: Imperial City, criminal records

skills.name: Persuasion
skills.description: Using language (including body language) to sway the opinions of others
skills.specializations: Form of persuasion: debate, flirting

skills.name: Search
skills.description: The ability to search a room, area, or person
skills.specializations: Tracking

skills.name: Singing
skills.description: The ability to sing well

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: The ability to move without other people noticing
skills.specializations: Type of terrain: jungle, city, etc.

skills.name: Aquatic Vehicle Engineering
skills.description: Creating new aquatic vehicle designs
skills.specializations: Type or model of vessel

skills.name: Aquatic Vehicle Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying naval surface or submersible vessels
skills.specializations: Type or model of vessel

skills.name: Archaic Gun Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying black powder weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of gun: black powder pistol, wheel-lock, etc.

skills.name: Armor Design
skills.description: Creating new body armor types
skills.specializations: Type or model of armor: stormtrooper armor, etc.

skills.name: Armor Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying body or protective armor
skills.specializations: Type or model of armor: stormtrooper armor, etc.

skills.name: Battle Station Engineering
skills.description: Creating or modifying battle station designs

skills.name: Battle Station Repair
skills.description: Fixing battle station installations

skills.name: Battle Station Weapon Engineering
skills.description: Creating or modifying battle station-scale weapons

skills.name: Battle Station Weapon Repair
skills.description: Fixing battle station-scale weapons

skills.name: Blaster Artillery Engineering
skills.description: Creating or modifying blaster artillery support weapons

skills.name: Blaster Repair
skills.description: Repairing or modifying blasters and other energy weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of blaster: blaster pistol, blaster artillery, etc.

skills.name: Blaster Engineering
skills.description: Creating new blaster energy weapon designs
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: blaster pistol, etc.

skills.name: Bowcaster Repair
skills.description: Repairing the Wookiee bowcaster

skills.name: Bow Repair
skills.description: Repairing bow-type weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of bow: long bow, crossbow, etc.

skills.name: Capital Ship Engineering
skills.description: Creating new capital ship designs
skills.specializations: Type or class of ship: Imperial Star Destroyer, etc.

skills.name: Capital Ship Repair
skills.description: Repairing a capital-scale starship
skills.specializations: Type or class of ship: Victory Star Destroyer, Nebulon B frigate

skills.name: Communications Repair
skills.description: Repairing portable or character-scale communication devices

skills.name: Computer Engineering
skills.description: Creating or modifying computer mainframes and datapads

skills.name:
Computer Programm-

ing/Repair
skills.description: Operating a computer or data terminal, or modifying computer programs or systems

skills.name: Construction
skills.description: Repairing or modifying an existing structure or building

skills.name: Cyborg Technology
skills.description: Knowledge of biomechanical enhancements

skills.name: Demolitions
skills.description: Setting explosives to destroy an object or area

skills.name: Droid Repair
skills.description: Repairing a droid

skills.name: Encryption

skills.name: Engineering
skills.description: Creating new structures and designs

skills.name: Firearms Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying firearms and slugthrowers

skills.name: First Aid

skills.specializations: Species of patient: humans, Wookiees, etc.

skills.name: Ground Vehicle Repair

skills.specializations: Type or model of vehicle: compact assault vehicle, Juggernaut, etc.

skills.name: Jet Pack Engineering
skills.description: Creating new jet pack designs

skills.name: Jet Pack Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying jet packs

skills.name: Lightsaber Repair
skills.description: Repairing the age-old weapon of the Jedi

skills.name: Machinery Repair
skills.description: Fixing or Modifying industrial machinery

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: Performing complex operating procedures
skills.specializations: Field of medicine: medicines, cyborging, etc.

skills.name: Melee Weapon Construction
skills.description: Creating or modifying melee weapon designs
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: sword, club, etc.

skills.name: Melee Weapon Repair
skills.description: Fixing melee weapons
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: vibro-axe, knife, etc.

skills.name: Musical Instrument Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying musical instruments

skills.name: Powersuit Repair
skills.description: Repairing powered suits
skills.specializations: Type or model of suit: stormtrooper armor, etc.

skills.name: Prosthetic Design
skills.description: Creating or modifying prosthetic devices

skills.name: Prosthetic Repair
skills.description: Repairing prosthetic devices

skills.description: Creating new repulsorlift designs
skills.specializations: Type or model of repulsorlift: landspeeder, etc.

skills.description: Repairing repulsorlifts

skills.name: Rocket Pack Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying rocket packs

skills.name: Sailed Nautical Vessel Repair
skills.description: Fixing sailed nautical vessels

skills.name: Security
skills.description: Bypassing security systems, coded alarms, locks, and the like
skills.specializations: Type of security system: retinal locks, blast doors, etc.

skills.name: Space Transports Engineering
skills.description: Creating new space transport designs
skills.specializations: Type or model of ship: Gallofree transport, Corellian Action IV transport, etc.

skills.name: Space Transports Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying space transports
skills.specializations: Type or model of ship: YT-1300 transports, etc.

skills.name: Starfighter Engineering
skills.description: Creating new starfighter designs

skills.name: Starfighter Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying starfighters
skills.specializations: Type or model of ship: X-wing, TIE-fighter

skills.name: Starship Weapon Engineering
skills.description: Creating new starship weapon design

skills.name: Starship Weapon Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying starship weaponry
skills.specializations: Type or model of weapon: laser cannon, turbolasers, etc.

skills.name: Swoop Engineering
skills.description: Creating new swoop designs

skills.name: Swoop Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying swoops

skills.name: Walker Engineering
skills.description: Creating new walker designs

skills.name: Walker Repair
skills.description: Fixing or modifying walkers
skills.specializations: Type or model of walker: AT-AT, AT-PT, etc.

skills.name: Control
skills.description: Control is the Jedi’s ability to control her own body. A Jedi with control can access her own internal well of Force energy, learning harmony with and mastery over the functions of her own body.

skills.name: Sense
skills.description: Sense teaches a Jedi to sense the Force in other things beyond her own body. The Jedi learns to feel the bonds that connect all living things and gains the ability to understand how all things are interconnected. Sense governs powers such as detecting danger and learning information about the world around the Jedi.

skills.name: Alter
skills.description: A Jedi with alter learns how to change the distribution and nature of the Force. Jedi who have mastered alter can move physical objects with their minds, can help others control their own Force, or can manipulate the Force in the bodies of others. This power can be used to change the perceptions of others and make them come to incorrect conclusions.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Performing feats of gymnastics, extraordinary balance, and dance (and related performance arts), as well as breaking falls and escaping from bonds.

skills.name: Brawling
skills.description: Competence in unarmed combat.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Slipping out of danger’s way, whether avoiding an attack or a sprung booby trap.

skills.name: Firearms
skills.description: Shooting any gun a person can carry, even if it requires a tripod setup to fire. Covers everything from small slug throwers to shoulder-launched rockets.

skills.name: Flying/0-G
skills.description: Maneuvering under on one’s own power (such as with wings) or in zero-gravity environments (such as drifting through space in an environmental suit).

skills.name: Melee Combat
skills.description: Wielding hand-to-hand weapons.

skills.name: Missile Weapons
skills.description: Firing unpowered ranged weapons.

skills.name: Riding
skills.description: Controlling and riding domesticated mounts.

skills.name: Running
skills.description: Moving quickly while avoiding obstacles and keeping from stumbling.

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.description: Nimbleness with the fingers, including picking pockets, palming items, and opening mechanical locks.

skills.name: Throwing
skills.description: Hitting a target accurately with a thrown item, including grenades, stones, and knives. Also used for catching thrown items. (Using or modifying grenades as explosives for special destructive effects requires the demolitions skill.)

skills.name: Climb/Jump
skills.description: Climbing or jumping over obstacles.

skills.name: Lift
skills.description: Moving or lifting heavy objects, as well as the ability to inflict additional damage with strength-powered weapons.

skills.name: Stamina
skills.description: Physical endurance and resistance to pain, disease, and poison.

skills.name: Swim
skills.description: Moving and surviving in a liquid medium

skills.name: Comm
skills.description: Effectively using communication devices and arrays.

skills.name: Exoskeleton Operation
skills.description: Using single-person conveyances with skills and abilities that substitute for (not augment) the character’s own skills and abilities. This skill substitutes for the character’s Agility and Strength skills when using the “suit.”

skills.name: Gunnery
skills.description: Accurately firing weapons mounted on powered armor, vehicles, and spaceships, or within fortresses.

skills.name: Navigation
skills.description: Plotting courses, such as through space using a vessel’s navigational computer interface, or on land using maps or landmarks, as well as creating maps.

skills.name: Piloting
skills.description: Flying air- or space-borne craft, from hovercraft and in-atmosphere fighters to transports and battleships.

skills.name: Sensors
skills.description: Operating scanner arrays to gather information about one’s surroundings.

skills.name: Shields
skills.description: Deploying and redirecting shields aboard vehicles.

skills.name: Vehicle Operation
skills.description: Operating non-flying vehicles traveling on or through the ground or a liquid medium.

skills.name: Aliens
skills.description: Understanding of aliens not of the character’s own species and their physiology, customs, and history.

skills.name: Astrography
skills.description: Familiarity with astrographic features (planets, star systems, nebulae), and general knowledge of any civilized elements present (settlements, industry, government, orbital installations).

skills.name: Bureaucracy
skills.description: Knowledge of and ability to use a bureaucracy’s intricate procedures to gain information, and favors, or attain other goals.

skills.name: Business
skills.description: Comprehension of business practices and the monetary value of goods and opportunities, including the ability to determine how to make money with another skill the character has. Business can complement bargain when haggling over prices for goods and services being bought or sold.

skills.name: Cultures
skills.description: Understanding of the manners, customs, and social expectations of different cultures, including one’s own.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Using physical presence, verbal threats, taunts, or fear to influence others or get information out of them.

skills.name: Languages
skills.description: Familiarity with and ability to use various forms of communication, including written, spoken, and nonverbal. Characters may choose one “native” language in which they have written and spoken fluency. Additional languages in which a character has proficiency can be represented by specializations of this skill.

skills.name: Scholar
skills.description: This skill represents knowledge and/or education in areas not covered under any other skill (such as chemistry, mathematics, archeology, cooking, art, etc.). This may be restricted to a specific field (represented by specializations) or a general knowledge of a wide range of subjects. It is used to remember details, rumors, tales, legends, theories, important people, and the like, as appropriate for the subject in question. However, the broader the category, the fewer the details that can be recalled. It covers what the character himself can recall. Having another skill as a specialization of the scholar skill means that the character knows the theories and history behind the skill but can’t actually use it. Scholar can be useful with investigation to narrow a search for information.

skills.name: Security Regulations
skills.description: Understanding of how law enforcement organizations, regulations, and personnel operate.

skills.name: Streetwise
skills.description: Finding information, goods, and contacts in an urban environment, particularly through criminal organizations, black markets, and other illicit operations. Also useful for determining possible motives and methods of criminals.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: Knowledge of techniques for surviving in hostile, wilderness environments, as well as the ability to handle animals.

skills.name: Tactics
skills.description: Familiarity with deploying military forces and maneuvering them to the best advantage.

skills.name: Willpower
skills.description: Ability to withstand stress, temptation, other people’s interaction attempts, mental attacks, and pain. The Game Master may allow a specialization in a specific faith tradition or belief system to enhance many, though not all, applications of willpower.

skills.name: Artist
skills.description: Making works of art, like paintings, photographs, and music or literary compositions.

skills.name: Bargain
skills.description: Haggling over prices for goods and services being bought or sold, as well as using bribery.

skills.name: Command
skills.description: Effectively ordering and coordinating others in team situations (such as commanding a battleship crew).

skills.name: Con
skills.description: Bluﬃng, lying, tricking, or deceiving others, as well as verbal evasiveness, misdirection, blustering, and altering features or clothing to be unrecognizable or to look like someone else. Also useful in putting on acting performances.

skills.name: Forgery
skills.description: Creating and noticing false or altered documentation in various media (paper, electronic, plastic card, etc.), including counterfeiting, though tasks may require other skills to help detect or make the forgery.

skills.name: Gambling
skills.description: Winning and cheating at games of strategy and luck.

skills.name: Hide
skills.description: Concealing objects, both on oneself and using camouflage.

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: Gathering information, researching topics, analyzing data, and piecing together clues.

skills.name: Know-how
skills.description: Figuring out how to perform an action in which the character does not have experience, as well as a catch-all skill encompassing areas not covered by other skills (such as utilitarian sewing or cooking).

skills.name: Persuasion
skills.description: Influencing others or getting information out of them through bribery, honest discussion, debate, diplomacy, speeches, friendliness, flattery, or seduction. Also useful in negotiations, business transactions, and putting on performances (such as singing, acting, or storytelling).

skills.name: Search
skills.description: Spotting hidden objects or people, reconnoitering, lipreading, eavesdropping on or watching other people, or tracking the trails they’ve left behind.

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: Moving silently, avoiding detection and hiding one-self.

skills.name: Armor Repair
skills.description: Fixing damaged armor.

skills.name: Computer Interface/Repair
skills.description: Programming, interfacing with, and fixing computer systems.

skills.name: Demolitions
skills.description: Setting explosives to achieve particular destructive effects.

skills.name: Exoskeleton Repair
skills.description: Repairing and modifying exoskeletons, powered armor, environmental suits, and similar suits.

skills.name: Firearms Repair
skills.description: Repairing and modifying any gun a person can carry, from small slug throwers to shoulder-launched rockets.

skills.name: Flight Systems Repair
skills.description: Fixing damaged systems aboard flying vehicles and spaceships.

skills.name: Gunnery Repair
skills.description: Fixing weapons mounted on powered armor, vehicles, or spaceships, or within fortresses.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: Using basic field medicine to treat injuries, as well as detailed understanding and applying medical procedures, such as diagnosing illnesses, performing surgery, and implanting cybernetics.

skills.name: Personal Equipment Repair
skills.description: Fixing small electronic equipment, including damaged cybernetics.

skills.name: Robot Interface/Repair
skills.description: Programming, interfacing with and fixing robots and their systems.

skills.name: Security
skills.description: Installing, altering, and bypassing electronic security and surveillance systems.

skills.name: Vehicle Repair
skills.description: Fixing ground- and ocean-based vehicles that do not fly.

skills.name: Channel
skills.description: Focusing energy within herself and her surroundings to harm others or protect herself and others from harm.

skills.name: Sense
skills.description: Detecting anything in existence, learn about her surroundings, and touch and influence minds.

skills.name: Transform
skills.description: Altering people and things within the universe, including moving something from one location to another and changing a target’s natural capabilities temporarily.
